# predict.courses — Education & Online Learning Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for education & online learning. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.courses is a prediction market platform focused on education & online learning. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Education & Online Learning prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.courses)
- [Markets — Active education & online learning prediction markets](https://predict.courses#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, education & online learning, betting, odds, forecast, predict.courses
